'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [ability](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAbilities/) in {{poe2}}.

## Description

{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

## Effects

{{#var:effects_formatted}}

## Notes

* Automatically learned by (but not exclusive to) the [Lifegiver](/lifegiver/) druid subclass at level 7 / 10.
* The effect "pulses" 5 times every 3 seconds, making the total duration around 25 seconds.
